work.name: College of Intelligence and Computing, Tianjin University
work.position:
Tenured Associate Professor (研究员、长聘副教授) 
 Leader of Software Engineering Team (软件工程团队负责人)

education.area: PhD student in computer science under the supervision of Prof. Bing Xie, Prof. Lu Zhang, Prof. Dan Hao  and Prof. Yingfei Xiong

education.institution: The University of Texas at Dallas
education.area: visiting PhD student in computer science under the supervision of Prof. Lingming Zhang

awards.title: Nobel Prize in Physics
awards.summary: The Nobel Prizes are five separate prizes that, according to Alfred Nobel's will of 1895, are awarded to 'those who, during the preceding year, have conferred the greatest benefit to humankind.'

interests: Software Testing and Debugging: Mainly focusing on Data-Driven Software Testing, Compiler Testing, Trusted AI, Regression Testing, Automated Debugging
Software Maintenance: Mainly focusing on AIOps (based on Machine Learning and Deep Learning techniques for software maintenance)
